name: part_005
file: tmp_≪-KAGURA- Dance of the Gods 3D LIVE≫ Hakos Baelz Birthday 2025 + ANNOUNCEMENTS! #BaeDDay2025 [viPlIHvk724]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Hakos Baelz performs the song "Saku no Nie".
Transition scene showing silhouettes on shoji doors.
Hakos Baelz and syudou perform the song "Gingiragin".

subtitles.original: 朔の贄
subtitles.english: Saku no Nie (The Sacrifice of the New Moon)

subtitles.original: この命をさあ捧げる
subtitles.english: I shall offer up this life.

subtitles.original: 運命なら抗うのは幼ない
subtitles.english: If it's destiny, resisting it is futile.

subtitles.original: 孤児になった父母が残した
subtitles.english: My parents, who made me an orphan, left behind...

subtitles.original: その眼差しは心の呪いとなる
subtitles.english: ...a gaze that becomes a curse upon my heart.

subtitles.original: 憎しみが争いを 争いが悲しみを
subtitles.english: Hatred brings conflict, and conflict brings sorrow.

subtitles.original: 輪のように世界をかき乱すなら
subtitles.english: If it disturbs the world like a cycle...

subtitles.original: 小さなこの命に生きる意味を
subtitles.english: ...then the meaning of living in this small life...

subtitles.original: あなたが宿したんだ
subtitles.english: ...is something you have instilled in me.

subtitles.original: 禍物同士運命の采が並べた
subtitles.english: Evil entities arranged by the die of fate.

subtitles.original: 願わくば最後まで
subtitles.english: If I may wish, until the very end...

subtitles.original: この想いをこの心を
subtitles.english: These feelings, this heart...

subtitles.original: あなたに捧げるのならば
subtitles.english: ...if I am to offer them to you...

subtitles.original: 慰めも憐れみもいらないから
subtitles.english: ...then I need neither comfort nor pity.

subtitles.original: この誓いをこの運命を
subtitles.english: This vow, this destiny...

subtitles.original: あなたが望むのならば
subtitles.english: ...if it is what you desire...

subtitles.original: 苦しみも悲しみも抱きしめるから
subtitles.english: ...then I will embrace both the pain and the sorrow.

subtitles.original: 喝采を浴びるのは人ならざる異形の
subtitles.english: Basking in the applause are non-human monstrosities.

subtitles.original: 逆光に隠れるのは人の形潜むの
subtitles.english: Hiding in the backlight are those dwelling in human form.

subtitles.original: 禍物同士運命の采が並べた
subtitles.english: Evil entities arranged by the die of fate.

subtitles.original: 願わくば最後までその瞳を
subtitles.english: If I may wish, until the very end, those eyes...

subtitles.original: この命をこの世界を
subtitles.english: This life, this world...

subtitles.original: あなたが受け入れるなら
subtitles.english: ...if you accept them...

subtitles.original: 憎しみも悲しみもいらないから
subtitles.english: ...then I need neither hatred nor sorrow.

subtitles.original: この想いをこの心を
subtitles.english: These feelings, this heart...

subtitles.original: あなたに捧げるのならば
subtitles.english: ...if I am to offer them to you...

subtitles.original: その命を響かせて
subtitles.english: ...then let that life resonate.

subtitles.original: この誓いをこの運命を
subtitles.english: This vow, this destiny...

subtitles.original: あなたが望むのならば
subtitles.english: ...if it is what you desire...

subtitles.original: 苦しみも悲しみも抱きしめるから
subtitles.english: Then I will embrace both the pain and the sorrow.

subtitles.original: 抱きしめるから
subtitles.english: Because I will embrace them.

subtitles.original: Hey、ホントつまらねぇと言ってやるよこの場で
subtitles.english: Hey, I'll tell you right here, it's really boring.

subtitles.original: あたりさわりなくして恥さえも回答爆など
subtitles.english: Smoothing things over, even shame is like a feedback loop.

subtitles.original: そうずっと変わらないでずっと変わり続ける
subtitles.english: Yes, staying the same forever, and changing forever.

subtitles.original: 五里霧中に媚びずかますそれがやっぱカッコいいだろ
subtitles.english: Pushing through the fog without flattery, that's what's cool, right?

subtitles.original: ギンギラギン
subtitles.english: Gingiragin (Flashy and Bright)

subtitles.original: 無礼正直な言葉で ステージ上ではガスだけ
subtitles.english: With rude and honest words, on stage it's just gas.

subtitles.original: 頭の中にこびりついて取れぬ景色見せるだけ
subtitles.english: Just showing a view that's stuck in your head and won't leave.

subtitles.original: この波の毛並み並みじゃないけど
subtitles.english: The texture of these waves isn't ordinary, but...

subtitles.original: 何者より高く波に乗るな舐めないでほしいぜ
subtitles.english: ...don't ride the wave higher than anyone else, don't underestimate me.

subtitles.original: ネットはさながら風呂場の延長
subtitles.english: The internet is just like an extension of the bathroom.

subtitles.original: データの洪水かつ日々炎上
subtitles.english: A flood of data and daily controversies.

subtitles.original: 石川みたいに身を入り洗浄
subtitles.english: Cleansing oneself thoroughly like Ishikawa.

subtitles.original: 一生戦場それがランダム
subtitles.english: A lifelong battlefield, that's randomness.

subtitles.original: このまま行こう
subtitles.english: Let's keep going like this.

subtitles.original: どんな甘いも酸いも全部食らってみせるぜ
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can take all the ups and downs.

subtitles.original: このまま行こう
subtitles.english: Let's keep going like this.

subtitles.original: どんな不意な不運に目眩っても
subtitles.english: No matter how unexpected the misfortune or how dizzying it gets...

subtitles.original: 錆びた鎖じゃ意味はなさず
subtitles.english: A rusted chain serves no purpose.

subtitles.original: 首元光らせギンギラギンに
subtitles.english: Making the neck shine, flashy and bright...

subtitles.original: ありのまま行く
subtitles.english: ...going exactly as I am.

subtitles.original: 真相俺は見せるだけ不敵な目線を得るまで
subtitles.english: I'll just show you the truth until I get that fearless look.

subtitles.original: 金食らうほどに下品に艶を
subtitles.english: Adding a vulgar gloss as much as money can buy.
